ygData.subject: RE: Vox Dead on Tarew Marr
ygData.msgSnippet: grats.  aren t dragon raids fun? =) also, always helps to have the organizer state the loot rules long beforehand. i guess everyone is saying they beefed
ygData.messageBody:
grats. aren't dragon raids fun? =)

also, always helps to have the organizer state the loot rules long
beforehand.

i guess everyone is saying they beefed Nagafen up. must not have touched
Vox yet, cause the same number of people you took Vox with got waxed by
Nagafen. and he has our drum, Vox is basically just for the fun of it for
bards. grats again.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server

p.s. i didn't know that belt was broken. the spear is delay 30. and the
tooth is indeed a single pet charge, not for research.


>
> Greetings and well met everyone.
>
> I am just postin a short message about Lady Vox being killed
> on Tarew Marr server (I think for the first time)
